detectors.description: PottedPotted._getRandom(uint256) (contracts/potted_potted.sol#314-317) uses a weak PRNG: randomlize (contracts/potted_potted.sol#316)
PottedPotted._tokenURI(uint256) (contracts/potted_potted.sol#295-300) uses a weak PRNG: potteds[tokenId].revealNum == 0 (contracts/potted_potted.sol#297)

PottedPotted._getRandom(uint256) (contracts/potted_potted.sol#314-317) uses a weak PRNG due to hashing tx inputs: randomlize = uint256(keccak256(bytes)(abi.encodePacked(blockhash(uint256)(block.number - 1),tokenId,msg.sender))) (contracts/potted_potted.sol#315)
